member.name: M:Roblox.Entities.Mssql.SqlStringExtensions.TruncateToNVarChar(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Truncates the given string into a complete string that will fit in NVarChar(x). This cleans up High Surrogates and ensure that we don't split UTF-16 chars like emoji into invalid characters.
Note the parameters. - DB => fieldName NVARCHAR(255) - Caller => fieldName.TruncateToNVarChar(255)
member.param: The value in your NVarChar(x) declaration in the DB.
member.returns: The truncated string if there were changes. The original string if there were none.
